thread.title: Man shot after Cowboys game
thread.title_full: Man shot after Cowboys game - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: Man shot after Cowboys game
text:
ARLINGTON, TX (KTVT/CNN) - Someone shot a man outside AT&T Stadium after the Dallas Cowboys game on Sunday.
The man was shot in a parking lot just after 8 p.m.
Police say event officers were responding to a call about a fight when they heard a gunshot.
First-responders took the man to a nearby hospital, before he was flown to a hospital in Fort Worth.
The alleged gunman was also taken to a hospital. Police believe he suffered minor injuries while fleeing the scene.
Authorities said they believe alcohol may have been a factor.
Copyright 2015 KTVT via CNN.
